title: Minecraft Java版 18w30a 发布
author: a1294790523
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a1294790523 于 2018-7-26 09:44 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.13.1 仍未发布，18w30a为其第1个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




You've just had the release of Update Aquatic and yet you still expect us to keep working? In this heat? Oh, fair enough - here's a Wednesday snapshot for the coming-very-soon 1.13.1 update! Enjoy it before we all melt.There is a known issue in the snaphot that sometimes player animations are too fast. It will be addressed tomorrow in a new snapshot!你可能还在期望着我们会在刚刚发布了的水域更新之后继续工作？在这么热的一天里？哦，我们是很公平的——这里是为即将到来的1.13.1的周三快照！在我们融化之前好好享受它吧。然后这里还有一个玩家动画有时会过快的已知问题，它将会在明天的快照中被修复！

FIXED BUGS：
修复的BUG：

MC-134570 - Door top half missing when updating to new versionMC-134570 - 在升级到新版本后门的上部消失了MC-134476 - Miss written sounds .json causing almost all 1.13 subtitles to be unshown (Fix included)MC-134476 - 没有写入sound.json而导致的1.13的字幕未显示的问题（内有修复方案）MC-134468 - Map cloning recipe only yields 2 mapsMC-134468 - 地图的克隆配方只能合成两张地图MC-134414 - Concrete powder falling onto sea grass just replaces itMC-134414 - 混凝土粉末在掉入海草时会替换掉它MC-134348 - Crash while upgrading: bkv{block=Block{minecraft:acacia_slab}, properties=[type, waterlogged]} has no property: halfMC-134348 - 在升级世界时崩溃：bkv{block=Block{minecraft:acacia_slab}, properties=[type, waterlogged]} has no property: halfMC-134300 - Inconsistency with update order when pistons retract other pistonsMC-134300 - 活塞拉回活塞时的更新顺序不同步MC-134298 - Observers don't detect retracting sticky pistonsMC-134298 - 侦测器没有检测到在缩回的粘性活塞MC-134297 - Observers detect moved blocks late in 1.13MC-134297 - 侦测器检测到方块移动的时间在1.13有延迟MC-134166 - Villager door detection order has changedMC-134166 - 村民门的检测顺序改变了MC-134115 - Containers next to chunk borders can lose items when upgradingMC-134115 - 接近区块边界的容器会在升级时丢失物品MC-133995 - Transferring world from 1.12.2 to 1.13 isn't workingMC-133995 - 无法将1.12.2的世界转换到1.13的世界MC-133986 - Non [a-z0-9/. _ -] character in path of location: minecraft:EntityHorseMC-133986 - 崩溃：Non [a-z0-9/. _ -] character in path of location: minecraft:EntityHorseMC-133959 - Credits don't appear when clicking "Copyright Mojang AB" in the title screen.MC-133959 - 在点击标题画面中的"Copyright Mojang AB"时没有出现开发人员名单MC-133942 - 1.13 Release is called a snapshot when backing up worldMC-133942 - 在加载以前的世界的提示中1.13正式版会被称为快照MC-133905 - Large oak trees generate without making block under stump dirtMC-133905 - 大型橡树不会在生成时将草方块变为泥土MC-133894 - Drowned don't drop items that they picked up as zombie then were convertedMC-133894 - 溺尸不会掉落在僵尸状态时捡到的物品MC-133871 - Waterlogged trapdoors do not update properly when openedMC-133871 - 带有Waterlogged方块状态的活板门不会在打开时更新MC-133839 - Crash when tp/at world borderMC-133839 - 在传送/位于世界边界时崩溃MC-133715 - Thrown tridents cannot be picked up after dyingMC-133715 - 死亡后不能捡起已丢出的三叉戟MC-133587 - Deleting server format errorMC-133587 - 删除服务器提示中的格式符错误MC-133251 - Curse enchantments don't use red textMC-133251 - 绑定诅咒附魔没有使用红色字体MC-132703 - Iron golems do not spawn in center of villageMC-132703 - 铁傀儡不会生成在村庄的中央MC-132663 - Command blocks kick player when entering certain commands > 256 characters in multiplayerMC-132663 - 当在多人游戏的命令方块中输入超过256个字符的特定命令时会踢出玩家MC-131868 - Concrete powder next to waterlogged blocks is not converted to concreteMC-131868 - 混凝土粉末在拥有waterlogged方块状态时不会转换为混凝土MC-131678 - Setblock property - block and setblock property - value are reversed in error messagesMC-131678 - setblock命令的参数——也就是setblock命令中的方块参数和坐标参数——其对应的数值在错误信息中反转了MC-131462 - Coordinate math error causes structure not to generate and possibly other issuesMC-131462 - 坐标的数学错误导致结构不能生成以及其他可能的问题MC-131029 - Villager door detection range has changedMC-131029 - 村民门的检测半径被改变了MC-125134 - Server crashes while generating new chunks – java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: We are asking a region for a chunk out of boundMC-125134 - 服务器在生成新区块时崩溃：java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: We are asking a region for a chunk out of boundMC-124942 - "Invalid book tag" is not translatableMC-124942 - "Invalid book tag" 不能被翻译MC-124690 - Successful "/bossbar set players" doesn't give success message in chatMC-124690 - 成功执行的"/bossbar set players"命令不会在聊天中给予玩家命令成功执行的信息MC-124543 - JSON-Text formatting in CustomNames of container blocks does not workMC-124543 - 在JSON文本格式的CustomNames容器里设置的方块不会正常工作MC-122625 - Order of contents of north- and east-facing double chests changed after update 1.12.2 -> 1.13MC-122625 - 在从1.12.2升级到1.13后，面向东面和北面的大箱子中内容的排列顺序发生了变化MC-119971 - Various duplications, deletions, and data corruption at chunk boundaries, caused by loading outdated chunks — includes duping and deletion of entities/mobs, items in hoppers, and blocks moved by pistons, among other problemsMC-119971 - 在加载以前版本的区块时在区块边界发生的各种各样的复制、删除、数据损坏——复制和删除实体/生物、在漏斗的物品、被活塞移动的方块等等MC-88356 - Bow animation broken in off-hand in third personMC-88356 - 在第三人称视角下，副手拉弓动画的损坏MC-88099 - Slimes/Magma cube with NoAI-Tag still can damage the playerMC-88099 - 史莱姆/岩浆史莱姆在带有NoAI的标签时仍然能伤害玩家







正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft  1.13（水域更新）特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
